name: the last machine
description:
a lonely caretaker robot explores Promethean Inc., an abandoned research facility and the last great remnant of human civilization.

as it ventures deeper into the halls of Promethean Inc., the robot begins to slowly uncover the horrible secrets hidden beneath the facility's surface.

[content warning: some mild pixelated violence, blood, death.]

----------

this game was made in Bitsy, in one and a half days, during a workshop lead by SingingStranger https://itch.io/profile/singingstranger.

this game's plot was partially inspired by Portal 2 and Thomas Was Alone :)
